about_the_game:
Soundtrack of the game Conjuntalia, the following Themes are included:

  • A Hero is Born - Jordan Turdgett.
  • Cave Theme - Beau Buckley.
  • Ghoulish Fun - Eric Matyas.
  • Main Menu Theme of Talia.
  • Snow About a Castle.
  • The Crypt - Michael Klier.
  • The Fantasy Orchestral Theme.
  • The Red Desert Caravan Theme.
  • Winter Four - Pheoton.
  • Winter Snow - Tom Peter.
  • Wrong Rite Theme - Pierre Bondoerffer.
